/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. A large overpass, a testament to the city's infrastructure, stretches across the street, connecting different parts of the city. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the urban landscape.
